title: Venezuela allows Uruguay to pay for some oil with goods, services
body: 34M subscribers in the worldnews community. A place for major news from around the world, excluding US-internal news.
readable_content: - Hellscreamgold (2014-03-04): funny...how Venezuela has no problem taking charity from OPEC while oil prices are down. Hope their economy goes to zilch and the government collapses. f em
